channel.title: Crash in research facility. HELP!
channel.description: In the very beginning of the game, where you are to load the specimen and everything goes haywire. I get teleported next to the aliens and whenever it says "loading" my game crashes. Any probable fixes? hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_19T5_37_2C0.mdmp (86.3 KB)

item.title: Crash in research facility. HELP!
item.dc:creator: antrp93
item.description:
In the very beginning of the game, where you are to load the specimen and everything goes haywire. I get teleported next to the aliens and whenever it says “loading” my game crashes. Any probable fixes?
